a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: New cases of HIV per 1000 individuals, UNAIDS vs. IHME estimates, 2019
Incidence of HIV, measured as the number of new cases per 1000 individuals of all ages, based on UNAIDS versus
IHME, Global Burden of Disease estimates.
New cases of HIV per 1000 individuals (IHME)
New cases of HIV per 1000 individuals (UNAIDS)
Data source: UNAIDS (2023); IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
